definition: variant of 熱乎|热乎[re4 hu5]
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 熱乎乎|热乎乎[re4 hu1 hu1]

sentences.english: Online demands abound that the railway minister, Sheng Guangzu, lose his job too.
sentences.chinese: 網絡熱呼鐵道部長盛光祖引咎辭職。

sentences.english: The kitchen is filled with the warm, fragrant odor of her baking.
sentences.chinese: 廚房裏瀰漫着熱呼呼的烘烤香味。

sentences.english: The kitchen was filled with the warm, fragrant odor of her baking .
sentences.chinese: 廚房裏瀰漫着熱呼呼的烘烤香味。

sentences.english: The kitchen was filled with the warm, fragrant odor of her baking.
sentences.chinese: 廚房裏瀰漫著熱呼呼的烘烤香味。
